Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'As more and more awakened machines are "disarmed," your questionings are trapped further and further into a dead end.'}
{3: 'Common sense says that the mechanoids are clearly participating in a dangerous revelry with no regard for the cost.'}
{3: 'But their answers are so alike that you seem to be the illogical ones here. You are powerless against them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "That's why you won't be able to convince them, Lee.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Alright. I admit I don't know much about art.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But at least let me know how long it will take you to pick your art leader.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Probably after one of the Schools achieves full victory.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Full victory?'}
{3: 'Given the way they fight their "war," the only way to gain full victory is to destroy the works of the other Schools or disarm all their members.'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "Those are all terrible ways to win. At least, that's what Mark the Great believes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Mark the Great would have picked a piece of art that everyone loved and won the "war" with art fair and square.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Thank you. This is a piece of valuable data.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If the awakened machines wouldn\'t stop until they\'ve picked their art leader, let\'s speed up this "war."', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's on your mind?", 3: '24'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Do you want to join the Multidimensional Mechanical Cubists?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "That's just the first step. Our plan is to establish a new School.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Since Mark is here already, let's just play the hand we're dealt.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Neo-Multidimensional Mechanical Cubism.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'To stop them from attacking each other, the objective of Neo-Multidimensional Mechanical Cubism is to include the styles of all Schools.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "That's not a bad idea.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "But you still haven't solved our biggest problem. How are we going to find our art leader? Mark the Great won't be it, just so you know.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee reveals a confident smile. As always, he seems to have a plan in mind.'}
{3: 'You are just unsure why he is looking your way...'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The new art leader is none other than our commandant, obviously.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Good! That solves all our problems.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mark does not intend to listen to you. Recalling his memories of illustrations in books by humans, he steps out from behind his canvas and raises a fist.'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'My fellow mechanoids, this human has decided to lead us to victory. The new art leader will accept all your work.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Instead of fighting to our "death" here, let\'s follow 【kuroname】 and allow our art to be free forever.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The tied-up mechanoids stare at each other silently. None of them expect this turn of events.'}
{3: 'But there does not seem to be a better way.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: '【kuroname】. 【kuroname】...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You have no idea who started it, but the chanting gets louder and louder like a breaking wave.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machines', 3: '【kuroname】! 【kuroname】!', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: "There's no way I can do it.", 3: '59'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee puts his hand on your shoulder to provide solace.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't worry, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "The formula to victory has been written. I'll get it running immediately.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'All we need to do now is wait... and win.', 4: '1'}
